column4: anyone:  i need help getting DSL on an old laptop.  i booted DSL form a bootfloppy and it is in some way running off a usb flash drive w/ DSL files ... it is asking for KNopppix and says without it i'm stuck with really small kernel.  ONe -i have xp.  aaand, i'll have to put knoppix in c:/.  i want M$  off machine
if you want DSL then go to their IRC channel. this channel if for ubuntu
there is no channel for dsl.  knoppix guys are very inactive.  waiting & waiting for response
you could try (x)ubuntu. or puppy linux.
yes, at least 8GB is necessary
for ubuntu
8GB or more
adn DVS01 i'd like to give M$ say, 15GB instead of 20GB.
what version of windows?
yeah 15 is more than enough
install windows then install ubuntu
windoze is installed.  i'm defragmenting and partitioning in preparation.
let the ubuntu installer do the partitioning
sorry, i just saw you answered that
ubuntu with lxde
not an option
lubuntu is lxde
older on the usb or on your harddrive?
i think unetbootin will write over it
and ubottu i'll take that b/c they look the same, there are great differences
